sentences.en: different ethnic communities
sentences.cn: 不同的少数民族团体

sentences.en: Hard times are forcing community colleges to turn away students.
sentences.cn: 当下时局艰难，一些社区学院被迫停止招生。

sentences.en: He was now a teacher and a respectable member of the community.
sentences.cn: 他现在是一位教师，并且是社区内受人尊敬的一员。

sentences.en: Incidents of this type cause irreparable damage to relations with the community.
sentences.cn: 这类事件会对与该社群的关系造成不可弥合的伤害。

sentences.en: News of 160 redundancies had sent tremors through the community.
sentences.cn: 将会裁员160人的消息在该团体中掀起了一阵骚动。

sentences.en: Petty crime is having a deleteri-ous effect on community life.
sentences.cn: 轻微罪行正对社区生活产生有害影响。

sentences.en: The community's links with Syria date back to biblical times.
sentences.cn: 这个团体与叙利亚的关系可以追溯到《圣经》时代。

sentences.en: The king's indulgence towards his sons angered the business community.
sentences.cn: 国王对儿子们的纵容令商界恼火。

sentences.en: The new arts centre will serve the whole community.
sentences.cn: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.en: The police haven't really done anything for the black community in particular.
sentences.cn: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.en: The police haven't really done anything for the black community in particular.
sentences.cn: 警方并未真正特意为黑人群体做什么.

sentences.en: the Polish community in London
sentences.cn: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

sentences.en: The school has won awards for its pioneering work with the community.
sentences.cn: 这所学校因其针对该社区具有开创性的工作而获奖。

sentences.en: The trend is towards reintegrating mentally ill people into the community.
sentences.cn: 目前的趋势是将精神病人重新融入社会。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: There is a smouldering anger in the black community.
sentences.cn: 在黑人社区里，人们的心中都揣着一团怒火。

sentences.en: They were convicted of affray and received community service sentences.
sentences.cn: 他们因殴斗滋事被判决为社区义务服务。

sentences.en: We guarantee that you will find a community with which to socialise.
sentences.cn: 我们保证你们会找到自己的交际圈。

sentences.en: We hear endless injunctions to build a sense of community among staff.
sentences.cn: 我们听到上面没完没了地讲要在员工中培养一种集体归属感。

sentences.en: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
sentences.cn: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

words.tran_cn: 地方自治主义；社群主义
共享；恳谈；宗教团体；圣餐仪式
谈心，亲密交谈；密切联系

phrases.tran_cn: 学术界；学术社群；高等教育界；高等学校的全体师生员工
社区卫生（健康）；公共卫生；社会健康
社会服务；社区服务性劳役
群落结构，社区构成；居住区组成

trans.tran_cn: 社会（团体），共有，(生物)群落
trans.tran_en: the people who live in the same area, town etc
